content.rendered:
Directed by Hardik Gajjar

Written by Hardik Gajjar. Shreyes Anil Lowlekar

Star Pratik Gandhi (Rajaram Joshi). Aindrita Ray (Rani). Ankur Bhatia (Lacchu). Krishna Singh Bisht (Gomu). Sounil Deshmukh ((as Sunil)). Shibesh Devnath (Tailor). Rajendra Gupta (Panditji). Shahdat Ikram (Ramleela Group).Jodharam Jaisinghani .Omi Kashyap . Shreyes Anil Lowlekar (Baghdu). Govind Mishra (Ramleela Group). Bhagyashree Mote (Pyaari). Bhamini Oza (Kalyani). Meenal Patel (Maniben). Om Prakash (Raghuram Joshi (as Om Prakash)). Ovais Rashid (Ramleela Group). Anil Rastogi (Netaji). Flora Saini (Urmi). Rajesh Sharma (Bajrangi). Abhimanyu Singh (Bhawar). Gopal Singh (Ratan Singh). Satish Trivedi (Ramleela Group). Ankur Vikal (Bhurelal)

Language Hindi

Producers Jayantilal Gada. Dhaval Pandya. Deepak Panth. Gajjar Parth

Production Back Bencher Pictures. Hardik Gajjar Films. Pen Movies
